servinfo.title: Cooling Water Pipe or Hose Removal and Installation

s1.ptxt: Drain coolant referring to Cooling System Draining .
To remove these pipes or hoses, loosen clamp on each hose and pull hose end off.

servinfosub.title: Installation
servinfosub.ptxt: Install removed parts in reverse order of removal procedure, noting the following.

item.ptxt: Tighten each clamp securely referring to Cooling System Components .
Refill cooling system referring to Cooling System Refilling .
